title: I had a bad GPA in high school. Is there any way I could still get into the Air Force Academy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not likely. Getting accepted into the Air Force Academy, as with all service academies, is a different process than enlisting. It may be possible to enlist in the Air Force, educate yourself as an airmen, get good reviews, and get accepted/nominated into an academy.
Did you graduate, then yes you should be able to enter the Air Force. You still need to pass the military entrance exam. The ASVAB Test
